name: nothing new on Tv
description:
Ludum dare 36 submition

Theme was : Ancient Technology

play the game, do some stuff, push some buttons.

I was shooting for the comp but needed one more day to finish.

Original page here

Game music is listenable here and downloadable here

controls :

left and right arrows to move

X or space to jump

C to shoot (depends on character)

down arrow to duck

Not tested on mac.

Tools used :

Graphics : Krita, Shoebox

Animation : Dragon Bones

Game engine : Unity

Music : Ableton Live

Sound Design : Audacity
